website_summaries.verdict: Instructions warn not to wear this suit in a chlorinated pool, but it's great for keeping children warm for outdoor water sports.
pros: Designed for flexibility and  warmth so children can comfortably practice water sports longer
2 mm neoprene for warmth and flexibility
Back zipper with extended zipper pull for easy on and off
cons: Cannot wear this suit in a chlorinated pool

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skinny child warm for swim team!
customer_reviews.text: RUNS SMALL. My 5 year old is 41 pounds with a 21 inch waist. He wears size 22 jammers. I ordered a 4 for him. It fits, but won't for long. As far as quality, it feels great, slides on easily. He swims on a year around team, and was freezing in the water of the indoor facility. He was actually shivering a few times so much his coach had him get out and warm up. This suit has made a HUGE difference and he is fine now!
customer_reviews.author: lcm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I love these wet suits. We ordered 2 for our kids to use for indoor swimming lessons year round (it’s a lap pool with water temps on the cooler side). They keep the kids warm but do not impact stroke development. I had read they are on the small side, but was hesitant to risk buying a size up as it needs to be fitted. End result - we will get several months’ use out of them before having to buy up a size. I still consider that worthwhile for the price and weekly use. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mummy

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: No smell, fit well, kept my kid warm! It was in the 60s and he was warm in the saltwater pool, and even in the Atlantic Ocean today with temperature of 69F (water was maybe 61F estimate for this time of year) and a super windy day at the beach. My son is 42” tall, 21” chest, 19” waist and the 4 fit him well. My only dislike is the logo/name across the chest, as I prefer no logos, but I get it and all companies do that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a very fair prize
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a very fair prize. we received this product yesterday. I ordered the size 6 and I was worried than it might be to big for my 5.5 yo tall boy but not so chubby! Well, i was wrong and it does fit perfectly. It does have a little room to grow in it but it just what i wanted. The quality seems also quite good. it's very thick and i believe it will keep my son's body warm in cool pool and even the fresh river, lac and sea waters! Can't wait:)
customer_reviews.author: Madelia B.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, but be careful with velcro
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good. Good quality 2mm neoprene suit. Been using it for one swim season and holding up well so far. The only reason I deducted one star is because the suit has unfinished edges, and the Velcro tabs are also just unfinished Velcro strips that stick out. During my first wash, the Velcro wasn't attached/closed well and ended up getting stuck to the edge of the suit, messing up the neckline. After that, I removed the Velcro so that the suit wouldn't get ruined in future washes.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Kept my little guy insulated
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my grandson always gets cold faster than anyone at the beach and at the YMCA pool . This really worked well to keep him warm enough to stay in the pool or the lake as long as everyone else so we didn’t have to leave just because of him and it kept him from shivering 10 minutes after he got in the water he usually starts shivering 10 minutes into swimming but he didn’t shiver at all .
customer_reviews.author: jackie rains

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It was too big for my child though she is wearing it for swimming classes in an indoor pool. It works and it warms the body and protect you from cold. The quality seems not so great but I will wait for a couple of months to see if the suit keeps its own colors because of pool chlorine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good budget wetsuit for kids :-)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old using the size chart, it fit him perfectly and was much better for him than the loaner wetsuits we kept getting from the dive shop, which never fit him close enough to keep him warm under water. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in hopes that my kids would stop shivering through swimming and diving lessons..worked like a charm. Size 6 fit my 6 year old and size 8 fit my 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good suit at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter used this for the first time in chilly Lake Superior. She found it comfortable and was the only one in the family who fully submerged. As a diver, I look for glide skin seals at the arm/leg openings to help minimize water flushing in and out of the suit, but this suit doesn’t have those. The edges are just rollled and stitched inwards. For $30, we really can’t complain too much. Suit is worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Worden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: One of the young ladies in my group home loves to swim but she also loves to undress in public. We bought her this wetsuit. She actually doesn’t want to take it off. The zipper in the back solved the undressing in public and she is so happy to be back in the water
customer_reviews.author: Leah Whittler

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: After one summer in this suit my son outgrew it, so we bought another and are able to use last years for my younger son. It's held up from frequent use with no problem. It's reasonably priced compared to others and I don't mind if I have to buy a size larger when they outgrow it. It's worth it! The suits are great, my kids love them. It keeps them warmer than regular swimwear which allows us to enjoy days at the pool for much longer periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Function and beauty
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It keeps my dd warm and looks awesome. Great quality. I received many complements from parents in swimming lesson and referred this to all!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs Small This wetsuit is of good quality. It keeps my toddler warm when swimming. I would buy this again except it runs really small. My 2 year old is wearing the youth size and it fits snug.
customer_reviews.author: Savvymom

customer_reviews.title: Very nice swimsuit! I have buying swimsuits for my son ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swimsuit! I have buying swimsuits for my son along the years and this suit is very high quality in comparison with others around right now. We had few Speedos as well as other lower quality brands. Somehow we could not find any suits for my son from speedo anymore. This one Is very close to Speedo suits as far as quality goes and we highly recommend. The only con is the petroleum smell. Other than that very nice choice among options in the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach and boogie boarding
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 8. Fits great for my 7 year old son (a couple of months from 8). Good price esp since he keeps outgrowing every year. Warm enough for northern California beach. Might be better to get short sleeves or shortie because not in the water for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Weyn

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated purchasing as I like a brighter colors to spot my child on the beach. But we kept bc the suit fits well. . My child is on the thinner side and likes that the suit neckline isn’t chafting his neck as previous suits.
customer_reviews.author: M. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Get a size up !
customer_reviews.text: Get the size up. My son is 41 lbs, but the size 6 fit perfect. The 4 was too skin tight even for a wet suit
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Quality suit
customer_reviews.text: The neck is raised. Its a quality suit for surfing, maybe overkill for swimming lessons with the high neck.
customer_reviews.author: SEA25

customer_reviews.title: great investment
customer_reviews.text: fits great and it helps to keep my skinny kid a little bit warmer during swim lessons
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pernischova

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit! Keeps my daughter warm and seems well made. Holding up to being used 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: walter

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made. Size 8 fit my grandson (who ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. Size 8 fit my grandson (who is small for his age) on his 8th birthday but would not have fit for very long. Returned for size 10 which is a little large for him, but will fit for the next year. He is stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Aleka

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit for cold beach days
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 years, 54” tall, and about 70 pounds. She is usually a size 10. I am glad I got her a size 12. Fits perfect a little bit room to grow. I would recommend at least one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Everson

customer_reviews.title: love it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year for my daughter as she grows out of the previous size. Love the price. Keeps her warm enough to swim in the lake. Fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Having worn wetsuits before we sized up and it worked out perfectly
customer_reviews.author: brandon653

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect. Tight but not too tight. He loved that he could find something with both of his favorite colors
customer_reviews.author: Laura McLane

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a wetsuits for each of my children and was very happy to find out that it’s made with good quality and fits true to size. I ordered size 6 for my 6 y.o. And 8 for my 8 y.o.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Bozko

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same swimming suit two years ago ,only one size smaller than this time. Beacause my daughter grew up,she needed a bigger one. She still wanted the same one
customer_reviews.author: Yinanchen

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids that shiver and shake!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for cool days at a local water park. He weighs 48 lbs and 52” tall and the 6 fit just right. Was so scared from reviews I read that it would be too small! Great quality! He will outgrow it way before it’s even broke in much as extremely well constructed. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for snorkeling and surfing in spring Hawaiian water. Fit perfectly on average size 10 year old. Bought size 10.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great fit. My kid likes
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this wetsuit. It’s great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stryker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but order a size up for your child.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. You will need to go a size up because this product runs more on the small side. I have tall and slender twins age 6. I ordered a size 8 for each of them and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good option for day time water exploring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yo son. He thought it was comfortable and easy to get on and offf. It helped his with the sun and reef. It did not keep him warm on a night dive.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: This should work fine. A good price and nice quality. I'm not crazy about the giant logo on it. It's an off brand, hide the logo.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It smells a little weird may be because of the material. But does its job. Absolutely water proof. I bought it for my son to wear in Florida in early Feb. This really kept him warm even in the gulf water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but runs SMALL!
customer_reviews.text: Product runs extremely small. Size up 2 full sizes or you will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Louann Flitton

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected. Kept my girls warm while sailing ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Kept my girls warm while sailing. They have only worn it a few times so I cant comment on how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: tickgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: The suit exactly what I expected to be. Very elegant and the size just perfect. My daughter is 11 around 150 cm and I got her size 12. Good fabric and nice style. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Haya

customer_reviews.title: This fit him perfect, he couldn't wait to get to practice and ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson swims everyday on the swim team and he's been wanting a wet suit for practice since the water is cold. This fit him perfect, he couldn't wait to get to practice and wear his wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: Chickee3g

customer_reviews.title: we bought a XS size and are very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It fit very well on my 6 y/o son who is on the petite side , we bought a XS size and are very happy with the purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on skinny 5-year old, good quality and keeps him warm (enough).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: I order 6 size its feet good like pic nice quality my girl like
customer_reviews.author: Vazira

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 4ft,
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4ft, 45 lbs - and size 4 was supper short + sleves were loose (not tight) so there is no point of this wetsuit
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy I

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality, great fit, great value! My daughter(6yrs old) loves hers and it kept her warm in cool water early in the summer. You won't be disappointed in your purchase if you go with this product.
customer_reviews.author: KNew

customer_reviews.title: Good starter wetsuit for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: Good starter wetsuit for a skinny kid without a lot of body fat swimming indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Willhoite

customer_reviews.title: quality material for the price
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my son warm during workouts. We shall see how it holds up but so far so good. Perfect for the price since they grow so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Taylor

customer_reviews.title: We were really happy with the fitting
customer_reviews.text: The product came and fit very well! We were really happy with the fitting.
customer_reviews.author: heung s kim

customer_reviews.title: Great material
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my son, the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wet suit wear.
customer_reviews.text: Used for surfing. Not as warm as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: barbara hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for water polo trainings. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marina P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first 6 months only
customer_reviews.text: After 10 months of usage in swimming pool the black color was changed to grey and collar comes to pieces to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: Great little suit
customer_reviews.text: Great little suit. It’s not for serious surfing but warm enough for what we use it for which is kids boogie boarding and playing in the surf or at a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Al T.

customer_reviews.title: Well made .
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit . Our son is tall and thin he’s 10 wears 12 slim . For a Reference.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Barli, r

customer_reviews.title: as some of my clients need them to be comfortable in the water
customer_reviews.text: I use wet suits for my swim school, as some of my clients need them to be comfortable in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Squid School

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit kids perfectly with a little room to possibly fit next year.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for the Price. Kept my son warm for trip to MI.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reese

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son and he was happy to wear it!
customer_reviews.author: H. Charles

customer_reviews.title: tight neck but keeps child warmer for swim lessons
customer_reviews.text: neck is too tight. my child is tall and skinny, almost 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Kids did a triathlon and outfit did great in all aspects of the race. Kids said it was comfortable. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: holli

customer_reviews.title: Nice suit - very small
customer_reviews.text: The suit quality was great but was so small compared to the size chart provided. I just ordered a new suit two sizes larger and hope this is big enough for my 5 year old who is about 45 pounds and average height.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Son very satisfied with the way it fits and feels
customer_reviews.author: Kari

product_meta.title: Lemorecn Kids Wetsuits Youth Premium Neoprene 2mm Youth's Shorty Swim Suits
feature_bullets: Affordable kids wetsuit designed for all water sports like diving, scuba, paddle boarding, surfing, kayaking, or hanging at the beach.
2mm neoprene for warmth without sacrificing flexibility.
50+ UV shield helps protect against children from sun exposure
Designed to increase warmth allowing children to dive, snorkel, and scuba, longer, and warmer.
Back zipper with extended zipper pull for easy on and off
